sub_fields.label: Content Horizontal Alignment
sub_fields.name: horizontal_alignment
sub_fields.instructions: This should be used when only 1 column is used, else will not take effect. It will center align the content container, but not the content itself, as that styling can be done in the wysiwyg editor upon context.

sub_fields.label: Image Wrapper
sub_fields.name: image_wrapper
sub_fields.instructions: The maximum width of the image in pixels.

choices.full-width: Yes, the image goes to the edge of the website
choices.container-width: No, the image is only 50% of the content width

sub_fields.label: Posts
sub_fields.name: posts
sub_fields.instructions: If left empty will show the number of latest posts found in the settings.

choices.hidden: Hidden (Assets are cut off on side of the section)

sub_fields.label: Full height
sub_fields.name: full_height
sub_fields.instructions: Is the minimum height of the scheme block window full height. This allows us to position blocks nicely.

sub_fields.label: Block Vertical Alignment
sub_fields.name: vertical_alignment
sub_fields.instructions: If full-height is enabled: How does the blocks position.

choices.enabled: Enabled (block scroll to the end of the section)

sub_fields.label: Minimum height (laptop/desktop)
sub_fields.name: minimum_height
sub_fields.instructions: When using Pin blocks sometimes we want the section to be a lot higher than the window height or the height the block is. This height will be disabled for mobile.
